item.title: Homework - Aaron
item.description: Atomic Notation 1. Define the following terms: a. Atomic number: The number of protons in the nucleus of an atom, which determines the chemical element.

item.title: Lab - Penny Isotopes
item.description: 1. Compare the average mass you calculated with the masses obtained by other groups in the class. Explain why the masses are not all the same. The average mass that my group calculated was 2.332g.
